AT.name: WordsUp! Academy
AT.description: Lade Words Up! Academy kostenlos herunter, wenn du Words Up! Academy schon für Wii U™ heruntergeladen hast. (Deine Wii U™ und dein Nintendo 3DS™ müssen mit derselben Nintendo Network ID verknüpft sein.) Es ist nicht so leicht, Teil der Akademie zu werden. Ihre berühmtesten Mitglieder warten darauf, dich in diesem außergewöhnlichen Puzzle- und Geschicklichkeitsspiel herauszufordern. Beweise deine meisterliche Sprachbeherrschung in WordsUp! Academy... wage die Herausforderung und erhalte ihre Anerkennung! Merkmale: • 6 Spielvarianten! Vom herausfordernden Haupt-Modus bis zum neuen Entspannung-Modus, wo du Wörter ruhig und ohne Zeitdruck entdecken kannst ... Das gefällt sogar deiner Mutter! • Zusätzlich findest du hier auch die Spielvarianten des Vorgängers 3, 2, 1... WordsUp! • Lerne Vokabeln in sechs Sprachen: Englisch, Französisch, Spanisch, Italienisch, Deutsch und Portugiesisch. Die perfekte Ergänzung zum Unterricht! • Zehntausende mögliche Wörter • Unbegrenzte Spielzeit • Fordere deine Freunde heraus und trage deine Highscores in die Online-Ranglisten ein! Beweise deine meisterliche Sprachbeherrschung in WordsUp! Academy! ... wage die Herausforderung und erhalte ihre Anerkennung!

AU.name: WordsUp! Academy
AU.description: Download Words Up! Academy for free if you have already downloaded Words Up! Academy on Wii U™. (Your Wii U™ and Nintendo 3DS™ must be linked with the same Nintendo Network ID.) Becoming part of the Academy is not easy; its most illustrious members are waiting for you, ready to challenge you in this extraordinary puzzle and skills game. Prove your mastery of language in WordsUp! Academy... and dare to challenge them and get their approval! Main features: • 6 game modes! From the challenging main mode to the new Relax mode, where you will have fun discovering words calmly and without any pressure... Even your mother will love it! • It also includes the game modes of its predecessor 3, 2, 1... WordsUp! • Practice vocabulary in six languages: English, French, Spanish, Italian, German and Portuguese; the perfect complement to your language course! • Tens of thousands of words to discover. • Unlimited hours of play. • And so you can get challenged by and with your friends, register your high scores on the online leaderbords! Practice your mental agility and your knowledge of the language in WordsUp! Academy!

Practice your mental agility and your knowledge of the language in WordsUp! Academy!

BE.name: WordsUp! Academy
BE.description: Vous pouvez télécharger Words Up! Academy gratuitement si vous possédez déjà Words Up! Academy sur Wii U™. (Votre Wii U™ et votre Nintendo 3DS™ doivent être liées au même identifiant Nintendo Network.) Faire partie de l’Académie n’est pas une chose facile. Ses plus illustres membres t’attendent, prêts à t’affronter dans ce jeu ingénieux de connaissances. Prouve ta maîtrise de la langue dans WordUp! Academy... Ose les défier et obtiens leur approbation ! Caractéristiques : • 6 modes de jeu ! Du mode principal stimulant au nouveau mode Relax, où tu pourras t’amuser en découvrant de nouveaux mots tranquillement, sans pression... Même ta mère l’adorera ! • Les modes de jeu de son prédécesseur sont également inclus 3, 2, 1... WordsUp! • Pratique vocabulaire dans six langues: anglais, français, allemand, espagnol, italien et portugais; le complément parfait de ton étude d'une langue ! • Des dizaines de milliers de mots à découvrir. • Des heures illimitées de jeu. • Et défiez vos amis en enregistrant vos meilleurs scores dans les classements en ligne ! Pratique ton agilité mentale et tes connaissances de la langue dans WordsUp ! Academy !

ES.name: WordsUp! Academy
ES.description: Descárgate Words Up! Academy gratis si ya tienes Words Up! Academy para Wii U™. (Las consolas Wii U™ y Nintendo 3DS™ deben estar vinculadas al mismo Nintendo Network ID.) WordsUp! Academy Entrar a formar parte de la Academia no es fácil; sus más ilustres miembros te esperan dispuestos a retarte en este singular juego de ingenio y habilidad. Demuestra tu dominio del lenguaje en WordsUp! Academy y ¡atrévete a desafiarlos y conseguir su aprobado! Características: • ¡6 modos de juego! Desde el desafiante modo principal, hasta el nuevo modo Relax, que te permitirá disfrutar descubriendo palabras de manera tranquila, sin presiones... ¡le encantará a tu madre! • Incluye los modos de juego de su predecesor 3, 2, 1... WordsUp! • Practica vocabulario en seis idiomas diferentes: inglés, francés, alemán, español, italiano y portugués; ¡el complemento perfecto para tu estudio de un idioma! • Decenas de miles de palabras por descubrir. • Horas ilimitadas de juego. • Y para que puedas picarte con tus amigos, registra tus mejores marcas ¡en las tablas de clasificación en línea! ¡Practica tu agilidad mental y tus conocimientos de la lengua en WordsUp! Academy!

IT.name: WordsUp! Academy
IT.description: Download gratuito di Words Up! Academy se hai già scaricato Words Up! Academy per Wii U™. (I tuoi Wii U™ e Nintendo 3DS™ devono essere collegati con lo stesso Nintendo Network ID.) Entrare a far parte dell'Accademia non è cosa facile: i suoi membri più illustri ti aspettano, pronti a sfidarti in questo straordinario gioco di rompicapo e abilità. Dimostra il tuo comando della lingua in WordsUp! Academy! Sfida i maestri per avere la loro approvazione! Caratteristiche : • 6 modalità di gioco! Dall'avvincente modalità Storia alla nuova modalità Relax, dove potrai divertirti a scoprire parole con tutta calma e senza stress... L'ideale per tutta la famiglia! • Comprende anche le modalità di gioco del suo predecessore: 3, 2, 1... WordsUp! • Esercita il tuo vocabolario in sei lingue: inglese, francese, spagnolo, tedesco, italiano e portoghese; il mezzo perfetto per l'uso di una lingua! • Migliaia di parole da scoprire. • Illimitate ore di gioco. • Sfida i tuoi amici, affronta le sfide con loro e registra i tuoi record nelle classifiche online! Mettiti alla prova in questo particolare gioco d'ingegno e di abilità. Con WordsUp! Academy! Farai esercizio mentale e pratica della lingua!

PL.name: WordsUp! Academy
PL.description: Download Words Up! Academy for free if you have already downloaded Words Up! Academy on Wii U™. (Your Wii U™ and Nintendo 3DS™ must be linked with the same Nintendo Network ID.) Becoming part of the Academy is not easy; its most illustrious members are waiting for you, ready to challenge you in this extraordinary puzzle and skills game. Prove your mastery of language in WordsUp! Academy... and dare to challenge them and get their approval! Main features: • 6 game modes! From the challenging main mode to the new Relax mode, where you will have fun discovering words calmly and without any pressure... Even your mother will love it! • It also includes the game modes of its predecessor 3, 2, 1... WordsUp! • Practice vocabulary in six languages: English, French, Spanish, Italian, German and Portuguese; the perfect complement to your language course! • Tens of thousands of words to discover. • Unlimited hours of play. • And so you can get challenged by and with your friends, register your high scores on the online leaderbords! Practice your mental agility and your knowledge of the language in WordsUp! Academy!
